item.title: Sitecore's site definition name cannot start with a number
item.description: I felt the need for this post because first of all, this is most likely a rare scenario where you will need to name a site definition starting with a number. And when you do, the error you get will baffle you as it is in no way directly related to the change you’ve made. Let me explain!
